components.name: Metastatuspage
components.description: The statuspage for Statuspage itself, at www.metastatuspage.com

incident_updates.body: Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

We will be performing a major version upgrade to our primary database instance. The total maintenance will not take more than 60 minutes and will include a total downtime of 20 minutes for all services.

During this maintenance window, our management portal and hosted pages won't be accessible and notification delivery would be paused. We will resume our operations around platform such as scheduled maintenances after the maintenance is completed.
